title: [OFFICIAL] Niji the Trooper Appreciation Thread
body:
Sometimes I'm overwhelmed by a torrent of thankful emotion, I figured I should express it tonight.

Niji, this is for you. Our Trooper, our hero; our saviour.

Never before have I felt so safe, so utterly protected. Tonight, I'm fronting up. I'm committing myself to managing and maintaining this thread, and it's all for you.

Thank you, from the depths of my soul. Niji the Trooper, our hero.

What a guy.
